title: Designing Clicker-Based Participatory Language Projects for Hospitality Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Hospitality Terminology and Service Scenarios
context.additional_context: Real-time feedback and small-group project integration using smartphone-based clicker tools.

learning_goals: Students identify three or more language issues occurring in hospitality situations in real-time via clickers and achieve an 80%+ accuracy rate.
Students generate and share at least five appropriate response expressions for service scenarios per peer evaluation systems in clicker-based discussions.
Students produce a 10+ minute presentation based on clicker analysis data to demonstrate hospitality language competencies in final projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
